text.title: Locke's Ego-Network
text.more:
This graph shows the central hub of Locke's correspondence network. I have filtered the group to include only nodes with a degree of one or higher. This means that those correspondents of Locke's who knew none other of his correspondents (roughly 40%) are not represented here.
Node size and redness represent "degree"; the number of connections each node has.
text.intro: This graph shows the central hub of Locke's correspondence network.
